title: FT/Citi Ingenuity Awards Education Forum: Urban Ideas In Action
summary: The FT/Citi Ingenuity Awards recognizes ingenious individuals or organizations that have developed solutions to urban challenges. Yesterday, we hosted the FT/Citi Ingenuity Awards Education Forum in London. "This Forum has highlighted critical trends, challenges and opportunities facing educators in cities across the world - the sharing of global best practices and ideas will help us all achieve better outcomes for young people," said Mark Cheng, UK Director for Ashoka and one of the Forum's panelists.
